title: Bazzu
author: Bazzu
content: according to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?Unpredictable. That's the word that I can say because many have failed with their predictions last year. Think of this year as a fresh start of the bear market and it's likely to be staying that long.Which means that I'm not expecting bitcoin and altcoins to be that up in the end of this year. We've got 2 months to go until this year ends but with that timeframe.It's likely that many things might still happen unexpectedly.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Unpredictable, but bitcoin and altcoins could go up at the end of the year, but it might still take some time for bitcoin to reach old ATH or even new ATH. It is very difficult to know which altcoin will be higher because it depends on how much support people have. Maybe we'll see the pump and dump that will happen to some altcoins, but we'd better wait. Or perhaps an altcoin that has a low price could be the one that will go higher later.

comments.author: monineklutak
comments.body: Quote from: S A KHAIR on October 30, 2022, 11:26:38 PMQuote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?No one can predict exactly what tomorrow's market will look like. But if you ask about my prediction, I think we are still in a red eye at the end of the year, the market will not rise or recover at the end of the year as long as the war persists or the inflation persists.It seems that it will be so considering that up to now the market conditions still look the same,we better be realistic so as not to be disappointed in the future,the important thing is to stay patient to wait for the bull market

comments.author: posi
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?It can go up or down, you should know that no one can predict what the market will be like in the future. Investing in bitcoin, I think you should find long-term predictions that will be better than short and medium-term. Maybe bitcoin will not rise at the end of the year but if you want to invest long term then you can believe bitcoin will rise and hit new ATH in the future, maybe in 2024-2025 we will see that. If you want short term investment then you should make your own prediction and take responsibility for your decision as no one can tell you short term bitcoin price.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: From all clear indications and lots of thread I have gone through all this while, many predicted the price to increase after the bitcoin halving channeling their minds to it. But naturally the price could increase or decrease before the end of the year, it's something you and I can't control or predict so as holder what you should do is to invest in bitcoin maybe after bitcoin halving we can see another ATH which could also affect the altcoin price to surge as bitcoin price keeps increasing.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Will anyone be able to predict precisely? That's impossible, like what happened to dogecoin did anyone think or predict in advance 1 to 2 weeks before the increase?What is presented is only speculation and those who know what coins will rise at the end of this year are trading groups that have already accommodated them at low prices.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Nobody knows whether it will go up or down or stay sideways at the end of the year. Usually when bitcoin goes up, and we are in a bull market. Alt coins go up much higher. Hence you are better off holding mid-cap alt coins in a strong bull market rather than bitcoin. However the opposite is true when we are in a bear market. You are better off holding bitcoin because altcoins can go to 99% losses.Same with sideways markets, bitcoin can stay the same price but altcoins can go down 99%.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?If the market is predictable, everyone will be doing cryptocurrency to always make the best profit from it, and in no time be rich. Don't be pressured with a time frame, The market may go up or come down further by the year's end which is the time you have given it. know that if there's barely nothing certain, one certain thing is that the prices will not remain the same.

comments.author: theskillzdatklls
comments.body: Bitcoin will likely go up in a major way under one of two circumstances:1. Interest rates fall.2. Governments print money (like UK) because of their higher interest rates.Either one is coming, the question is when, few people know that answer.

comments.author: Bazzu
comments.created_time: November 01, 2022, 11:52:29 PMLast edit: November 02, 2022, 12:06:30 AM by Bazzu
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on October 30, 2022, 11:01:07 AMQuote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?Unpredictable. That's the word that I can say because many have failed with their predictions last year. Think of this year as a fresh start of the bear market and it's likely to be staying that long.Which means that I'm not expecting bitcoin and altcoins to be that up in the end of this year. We've got 2 months to go until this year ends but with that timeframe.It's likely that many things might still happen unexpectedly.I think so too, because in terms of predicting, sometimes it's right, sometimes it's not. because indeed no one will know the fate of bitcoin and altcoin prices at the end of the year, especially during an economic crisis like today. so it is likely that the bear market will last longer.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: Some will say it can or can't since it's unpredictable but one thing I'm sure is whenever there's a Bitcoin halving that's the time the Bitcoin and altcoins will start pump it means an increase of prices since most altcoins will likely to follow what's the Bitcoin trend. Don't just expect of what the other said or what you heard since they can't determine what would be the price by the end of the year or in the future there's no one who can predict the price. And expectations will lead to speculating prices that's somehow beneficial to the traders because they will take advantage of it.

comments.author: jaberwock
comments.body: Quote from: posi on October 31, 2022, 03:00:45 PMQuote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?It can go up or down, you should know that no one can predict what the market will be like in the future. Investing in bitcoin, I think you should find long-term predictions that will be better than short and medium-term. Maybe bitcoin will not rise at the end of the year but if you want to invest long term then you can believe bitcoin will rise and hit new ATH in the future, maybe in 2024-2025 we will see that. If you want short term investment then you should make your own prediction and take responsibility for your decision as no one can tell you short term bitcoin price.There is a chance that the price can go up a little but there is more possibility that it will go down more because there is more negative news within this year and that can affect the decision making of others. They will think twice if they buy and hodl longer but most likely many of them will continue selling.We can't accurately predict bitcoin on our own but we can use the factors around us as a guide to help us predict closer to what we are predicting. Long predictions for bitcoin are surely positive so if we are long term investor then it gives encouragement to stick with our plans. Short term are full of risk and discouragement so it's hard to be successful on it.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?There is no sure way to know this, the most likely outcome at the end of the year is that we remain close to the price we are currently seeing, the next most likely outcome is a small drop in the price as I still think there is a little room for the price to go down as people begin to get desperate due to the lack of a favorable trend during most of this year, and with this in mind it is important to remain calm as panicking is never the right response when it comes to our investments.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?Previous years are on the sideways trend, especially during the holiday season where many wants to spend more. Though this market is very unpredictable and the trend can change anytime, we can only rely to it’s previous trend but it’s hard to know the future. Bitcoin and altcoin market can take a different way to end the year, just continue to analyze and position on a good prices, you can still make money here whatever the trend is.

comments.author: TelolettOm
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?There should be an increase in Bitcoin or altcoin price but we don't know how much the price to increase.Bitcoin price already survives above $20k, which means the price may increase gradually. In my personal opinion, Bitcoin price is possible to increase by around $23k - $25k at the end of this year. However, it can happen if there are good news that can trigger the price to increase. But if too many bad news, the price can drop again below $20k.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?Unfortunately it's not a matter of yes and no, there will be other factors at play that will influence how the coins will perform say new regulations in any of the crypto influential countries, political support, or the big whales/investors announcing their big buys to influence market sentiment and the alike.But on the technical side of chart analysis markets do look bullish for the month of November, December and its the perfect time to get bullish.

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: I am still bearish this month. But I am feeling bullish this coming December onwards. We may have a mini bull run this December up to the first few months of next year but then the market will drop again for the last time before it starts to move up slowly as it builds momentum preparing for the 2024 and 2025 big bull run. It is still far but I am getting excited. Although I do not have the same money for my investments this time unlike my 2016 and 2021 positions, I felt like I am more ready mentally than before.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? and if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?The price may go up as much as it can go down, but if you thought about it the end of the year people are always getting paid well and much businesses are getting in profit so those people would or might look into crypto to put some of their assets there or more potentials to earn more from some coins they see good. We hope to see a bullish market in all cases. But nobody can predict anything especially latest periods.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMaccording to your predictions or speculations, will bitcoin and altcoins increase in price at the end of the year or not? Bitcoin and altcoins will but bitcoin will not increase a lot. Im thinking about possible price for bitcoin at the end of this year. 30k might be possible by seeing the current price of bitcoin which has been surpassing 21k. it doesn't need a lot of time for bitcoin to go back again to the 30k price. Altcoins will be doing even higher than bitcoin caused by altcoins have low marketcap with more possibility to increase even higher compared with bitcoin. Quote from: Bazzu on October 30, 2022, 07:14:40 AMand if there is an increase in the price of an altcoin, do you think which altcoin will rise higher?yes, i do and why not? Bitcoin's price increase gonna triggering the price of all crypto in the market. Even you can also expect shit tokens being affected by the recovery of bitcoin. Bitcoin is a key to pump whole of altcoins at the same time. The price of altcoins are actually rely with bitcoin at this moment. If bitcoin does it and then altcoins too. The common cycle in the crypto
